neurotools.ntime module¶

neurotools.ntime.current_milli_time()[source]¶

Returns the time in milliseconds

neurotools.ntime.now()¶

Returns the time in milliseconds

neurotools.ntime.tic(st='')[source]¶

Similar to Matlab tic

neurotools.ntime.toc(st='')[source]¶

Similar to Matlab toc

neurotools.ntime.today()[source]¶

Returns the date in YYMMDD format

neurotools.ntime.waitfor(t)[source]¶

Wait for t milliseconds
